rules_text:
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, instead exile it with a core counter.
{2}: This artifact gains the abilities of your choice of exiled permanent card with a core counter. The same card can't be chosen more than once for this artifact. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
